basics.name: Christian Holm Johansen
basics.role: PhD Student in Health Data Science
basics.summary: PhD student applying deep learning methods to integrate omics and health registry data for predictive modeling. Dedicated to creating robust, reproducible software solutions that can deliver translational impact and real-world healthcare advancements.

work.name: Department of Public Health & Novo Nordisk Foundation Center for Protein Research,  University of Copenhagen
work.summary: Teaching at Palmer Physical Laboratory (now 302 Frist Campus Center). While not a professor at Princeton, I associated with the physics professors and continued to give lectures on campus.
